name: @coreui/icons-pro
description: Premium icons. More icons, styles, & tools!

scripts.css-compile-brand: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/brand.scss css/brand.css
scripts.css-compile-duotone: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/duotone.scss css/duotone.css
scripts.css-compile-flag: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/flag.scss css/flag.css
scripts.css-compile-linear: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/linear.scss css/linear.css
scripts.css-compile-solid: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/solid.scss css/solid.css
scripts.css-concat: concat -o css/all.css css/linear.css css/solid.css css/duotone.css css/brand.css css/flag.css
